name: Tank Ooga Booga detached stuff
description:
GMTK jam submission

Controls:
WASD to move the tank.
Left and right arrows to turn the turret, Up Arrow to detach.
While detached you move the turret with the arrows.

Space bar to shoot stuff.

Objective:
Find and press the 6 buttons gently.

This game can be played with 1 or 2 players. Either control both the tank and the turret yourself, or give turret controls (arrows) to a friend for an easier time.

The crew™:

  • Blauenzag (dev)

Don't bother getting a headset, as you can see our sound designers were on vacation
